reviews.review_msg:
Both phenomenal and crazy. 
 
 She loves to use really controversial topics for her examples. 
 Course requires hard work, but is the most practical course offered at SFU.

Difficult? Yes. Personal bias that she has no intention of hiding?Yes.  Talks about her outside business? Yup.  BUT, and this is important, the  only prof who will take time out to meet with you outside school hours so you can have a better grade/project.Take her with a grain of salt and L-E-A-R-N.
